entry.title: Okay but not really
entry.content:
You can buy and sell bitcoin, but that‚Äôs pretty much it. If you wanna shake to earn bitcoin you need to refer a friend first. And they need to buy $100 worth of crypto.
Also I got scammed out of $50 at a sandwich shop, Shakepay told me I was SOL and did not help me whatsoever. Highly recommend not using their card, because they do not have your back at all. They won‚Äôt do any investigation at all or look into anything, they‚Äôll just hide behind their terms of service. Garbage customer service.

entry.title: Stay Away ‚Äì Account Closed Without Reason After Years of Trust
entry.content:
I used Shakepay extensively and did nothing wrong. I trusted this app for over $7,000 worth of crypto exchanges. Suddenly, they permanently closed my account with no proper explanation, citing vague ‚Äúconfidential criteria.‚Äù They refuse to disclose what I supposedly did wrong. This is unacceptable for a financial service handling people‚Äôs money.
If you value your funds and peace of mind, stay away from Shakepay. They can freeze or close your account at any time without warning, leaving you locked out of your own money. Very disappointed and feel betrayed after being a loyal user.

Stay Away ‚Äì Account Closed Without Reason After Years of Trust

I used Shakepay extensively and did nothing wrong. I trusted this app for over $7,000 worth of crypto exchanges. Suddenly, they permanently closed my account with no proper explanation, citing vague ‚Äúconfidential criteria.‚Äù They refuse to disclose what I supposedly did wrong. This is unacceptable for a financial service handling people‚Äôs money.

If you value your funds and peace of mind, stay away from Shakepay. They can freeze or close your account at any time without warning, leaving you locked out of your own money. Very disappointed and feel betrayed after being a loyal user.

Shakepay turned me from broke Canadian to part-time Bitcoin tycoon‚Äîjust by shaking my phone every morning. App‚Äôs smoother than a double-double, and stacking sats has never been this easy (or fun). 10/10, would shake again.

entry.title: End of an era
entry.content: I loved Shakepay. Had huge respect for it focusing on bitcoin. Wasn‚Äôt happy about the eth junk but I guess they figured it was profitable. Anyways, the spread was always bad, many other cheaper exchanges. But the shake kept me coming back. Then they changed it where you had to buy to earn which was totally fare. I kept using the service, buying my little bit and enjoyed it. But then the end of the app came. The prepaid credit card. And that was it for me. Now I buy from another exchange. Shakepay could still be earning from my activity but they got greedy. Prepaid credit card are stupid. Everyone needs a major bank, Shakepay isn‚Äôt a replacement. No incentive is enough to make me use it. Nobody should be depositing their paychecks into an app with no physical stores or physical card. Madness. Honestly it should be illegal. I would have had more respect for them discontinuing the shake, or shrinking the rewards, or increasing the spread. The junk card was my break point. It‚Äôs too bad, I still shake for the free 21 stats but I‚Äôll just keep doing that until I forget one day and never open the app again. Shakepay is a classic example of why things don‚Äôt last in Canada. You get something good, then it turns to junk and eventually dies off. I suspect Shakepay won‚Äôt see 2030. Good luck too ya.

End of an era

I loved Shakepay. Had huge respect for it focusing on bitcoin. Wasn‚Äôt happy about the eth junk but I guess they figured it was profitable. Anyways, the spread was always bad, many other cheaper exchanges. But the shake kept me coming back. Then they changed it where you had to buy to earn which was totally fare. I kept using the service, buying my little bit and enjoyed it. But then the end of the app came. The prepaid credit card. And that was it for me. Now I buy from another exchange. Shakepay could still be earning from my activity but they got greedy. Prepaid credit card are stupid. Everyone needs a major bank, Shakepay isn‚Äôt a replacement. No incentive is enough to make me use it. Nobody should be depositing their paychecks into an app with no physical stores or physical card. Madness. Honestly it should be illegal. I would have had more respect for them discontinuing the shake, or shrinking the rewards, or increasing the spread. The junk card was my break point. It‚Äôs too bad, I still shake for the free 21 stats but I‚Äôll just keep doing that until I forget one day and never open the app again. Shakepay is a classic example of why things don‚Äôt last in Canada. You get something good, then it turns to junk and eventually dies off. I suspect Shakepay won‚Äôt see 2030. Good luck too ya.
